title: Ep - 147 - ANTHONY SCARAMUCCI FROM CELEBRITY BIG BROTHER / TANYA SAM FROM REAL HOUSEWIVES OF ATLANTA
description:
Anthony Scaramucci, nicknamed “The Mooch”, is an American financier, entrepreneur and political consultant who briefly served as the White House Director of Communications. Scaramucci discusses his role as a fake houseguest on this season of Celebrity Big Brother, the deep bonds he developed with the cast, how the opportunity relates to his short stint at the White House, and the most surprising conversation he had the night before he left the Big Brother house. 


Steve Tate reviews the Scary Island episode of Real Housewives of New York, one of the most talked about episodes in Real Housewives history. (Season 3, episode 12)


Tanya Sam is the newest cast member of Real Housewives of Atlanta. She opens up about her life before Bravo, how she met her fiance, the unusual career pivot into technology, her fertility journey, and whether she felt fully prepared to put her life on reality television. 


Reality Life with Kate Casey
